1 sun shadow thirty years ago marseilles lay burning sun one day blazing sun upon fierce august day greater rarity southern france time since everything marseilles marseilles stared fervid sky stared return staring habit become universal strangers stared countenance staring white houses staring white walls staring white streets staring tracts arid road staring hills verdure burnt away things seen
